Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:22.68]Alright!
[00:24.35]Everybody listen
[00:26.02]Listen to melody!
[00:28.20]Cause we need...
[00:29.81]Each and everyone of you!
[00:32.25]To go along with this song
[00:35.04]You ready?
[00:36.26]Sing it with me
[00:37.31]Dop dop dop dop dop dop...
[01:05.90]
[01:06.12]Let's go!
[01:06.78]When we go up
[01:07.44]We do it loud
[01:08.15]They never believe what we're talking about
[01:10.22]When we go up
[01:11.04]We do it loud
[01:11.95]They never believe what we're talking about
[01:13.91]When we go up
[01:14.81]We do it loud
[01:15.87]When we go up
[01:16.63]We do it loud
[01:17.54]When we go up
[01:18.51]When we go up
[01:19.93]Snare to the kick to the bass
[01:20.49]Make them jump!
[02:39.29]Dop dop dop dop dop dop...
[02:53.40]When we go up
[02:54.42]We do it loud
[02:55.27]They never believe what we're talking about
[02:57.20]When we go up
[02:58.11]We do it loud
[02:58.96]They never believe what we're talking about
[03:00.89]When we go up
[03:01.80]When we go up
[03:02.65]When we go up
[03:04.03]When we go up
[03:04.79]When we go up
[03:05.51]When we go up
[03:06.42]Snare to the kick to the bass
[03:07.88]Make them jump!
